metadata.title: CVE-2019-5850 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - untriaged
metadata.description: Use after free in offline mode in Google Chrome prior to 76.0.3809.87allowed a remote attacker who had compromised the renderer process topotentially perform a sandbox escape via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
